column4: 2015: Bias Correction of GCM Precipitation by Quantile Mapping: How Well Do Methods Preserve Changes in Quantiles and Extremes?. J. Climate

column1: # title:: Bias Correction/Constructed Analogue Quantile Mapping version 2.0 (BCCAQ2) downscaling model output for Canada
